name: Subu Sanu
greetingText: I really like your name btw! But i would love to call you mine :)
wishText: I love you & Happy birthdayy dear
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do and wish a happy birthday to you.
text3: But then I stopped and thought to wish you by the core of my heart
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special to me sanu maya
wishHeading: Happy Birthday My Love I Love you so so so so much!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
